name: Limited Edition Shoot My Heart Music Video DVD
description: The Hostages Shoot My Heart Music Video. Limited Edition run of 100. Written & Directed by Josh Holdaway & Jimi Love. Copyright Josh Holdaway & Jimi Love. Cover artwork by KL30.

name: Last Chance For The Hostages EP
description:
The highly-anticipated EP from The Hostages. “Its a long time since I've seen a band fill the stage like these guys; they ooze presence in an energetic and awe sapping performance that left everybody present in a universal state of admiration... Bouncing, boisterous booming....in a word, breathtaking.” Kev Martin, Brecon and Radnorshire Express

“... Although The Hostages still maintain some of their joyous naivety, it is clear that now more than ever that they mean business with their new image and a harder, more in-your-face sound... The band appear before you like a well oiled machine...” Izzy James, No Parents Zine
